box.title: Taxa Type Counts
box.sql: select Name, ObjectCount from (select CollectionObjDefID AS ObjectType, Count(CollectionObjectID) AS ObjectCount from collectionobject Group By CollectionObjDefID) AS T2, collectionobjdef where T2.ObjectType = collectionobjdef. CollectionObjDefID order by ObjectCount desc

box.title: CITES Permits Expiring
box.sql: select permit.PermitNumber, permit.PermitID, permit.IssuedDate,permit.StartDate, permit.EndDate,permit.RenewalDate,permit.Type From permit where ( lower(Type) like '%CITES%') and year(CURDATE()) = year(EndDate)
